latestVersion.termsOfAccess: This ia an ongoing project. Only data authors have access to the data,

fields.value: Capacitating African Smallholders with Climate Advisories and Insurance Development (CASCAID)

dsDescriptionValue.value: CASCAID aims to capacitate African smallholders and their boundary partners (NHMS, NGOs, CSOs, private sector) with actionable climate advisories, index insurance and integrated climate services that reduce the impact of seasonal climate risk from farm to country levels.
